headline: SEREN RF GENERATOR, 600 WATTS
description: RF Generator    Part number 9600610028.   You may also be interested in  Seren MC2 Matching Network Controller
categories.lvl2: Test & Measurement Equipment  >  Power Supplies > Radio Frequency (RF) Generators
specstable:
Manufacturer Seren
Model R601
Description RF Generator
Rated Power Output 600 Watts
Frequency 13.56
Scale MHz
Mismatched Power Output 100.00 W
Output Connector Type N
Panel Meters Digital
External Cooling Air Cooled
Other Information

Part number 9600610028.
This part number has analog interface connector pin 3 "RFON" modified, it will turn RF "ON" when pulled up to +24V.
If your application require standard unit (pin 3 internally pulled up to +5V, and will turn RF "ON" when pulled to the ground).

Request conversion to the standard unit P/N 9600610000 when ordering, please.


Input power: 90-125 VAC or 190-264 VAC, 47-63 Hz (universal input). Maximum current: 15A. There are no transformer voltage taps to configure.

Extended Description Details at 6100220000_R(L)X01_Series_OPER_MAN_V1_04.pdf
Power Requirements 120/240 V 15.0 A 47-63 Hz 1 Phase
Year of Manufacture 2007
Exterior Dimensions
Width 9.500 in (24.1 cm)
Depth 18.500 in (47.0 cm)
Height 7.000 in (17.8 cm)
Weight 33 lb (15 kg)
